heading: HB04509
0: AN ACT SEPARATING THE SOUTHERN BATARAZA NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL - BULILUYAN ANNEX IN BARANGAY BULILUYAN, MUNICIPALITY OF BATARAZA, PROVINCE OF PALAWAN FROM THE SOUTHERN BATARAZA NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL, CONVERTING IT INTO AN INDEPENDENT NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL TO BE KNOWN AS BULILUYAN NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR

history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB04509
FULL TITLE : AN ACT SEPARATING THE SOUTHERN BATARAZA NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL - BULILUYAN ANNEX IN BARANGAY BULILUYAN, MUNICIPALITY OF BATARAZA, PROVINCE OF PALAWAN FROM THE SOUTHERN BATARAZA NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL, CONVERTING IT INTO AN INDEPENDENT NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL TO BE KNOWN AS BULILUYAN NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
